ClassDesc: GooglePlayServicesRepairableExceptions are special instances of @B_com#google#android#gms#common#UserRecoverableException_E@s which are thrown when Google Play Services is not installed, up-to-date, or enabled. In these cases, client code can use @B_com#google#android#gms#common#GooglePlayServicesRepairableException#getConnectionStatusCode_E@ in conjunction with @B_com#google#android#gms#common#GooglePlayServicesUtil#getErrorDialog_E@ to provide users with a localized @B_android#app#Dialog_E@ that will allow users to install, update, or otherwise enable Google Play services.
